query:
SELECT 
  s.id as standard_id,
  s.title as standard_title,
  COUNT(et.id) as evidence_count,
  GROUP_CONCAT(et.evidenceName SEPARATOR ' | ') as evidence_names
FROM standards s
LEFT JOIN evidenceTemplates et ON s.id = et.standardId
GROUP BY s.id, s.title
ORDER BY s.id;

  s.id as standard_id,
  s.title as standard_title,
  COUNT(et.id) as evidence_count,
  GROUP_CONCAT(et.evidenceName SEPARATOR ' | ') as evidence_names
FROM standards s
LEFT JOIN evidenceTemplates et ON s.id = et.standardId
GROUP BY s.id, s.title
ORDER BY s.id;
